name: Sergeant Torent
Lore: 'Senior watch trooper at Death Star''s command center. Monitors external sensor data, scanning for Rebel activity. Vigilant in his duties.',
Text: 'Deploys -2 on Death Star. When in battle, adds 1 to your total battle destiny for each of your Death Star troopers present. While on Death Star, adds 1 to each of your Force drains at a battleground related to system Death Star orbits.',
